Class.name: Report.FINAPTBLineInvoice
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.Company as FINAPInvoice_Company,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.SupplierNumber,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.InvoiceNumber,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.BalanceBASE,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.GLEffectiveDate,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.InvoiceDate,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.DueDate,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.Detail,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.SupplierName as SupplierNameInvoice,SQLUser.FINAPInvoice.SupplierGroup from SQLUser.FINAPInvoice
